name: Yocto Extensible SDK (eSDK)
description: Installs Yocto Extensible SDK (eSDK) from a provided repository URL. The eSDK provides a complete development environment including BitBake and a configured sysroot.

sdkUrl.description: URL to the Yocto eSDK self-extracting installer script (e.g., from Artifactory, HTTP server). Leave empty to skip installation.

installPath.description: Path where the eSDK should be installed

autoSourceEnvironment.description: Automatically source the eSDK environment setup script in profile.d for all users
